item.description:
Late notice, but hopefully many of you will plan on coming THIS Sunday, October 1, to the October meet-up. We'll pick back up with the study guide to "Objectivism - the Philosophy of Ayn Rand," and for those of you who don't have a study guide (it's not so easy to get), I'll have copies. We'll pick up in Chapter 1 where we left off back in August.

Don't worry if you don't have a big knowledge of Objectivism or Ayn Rand's works - - that's what we're trying to learn. However, a familiarity with some of her writings - especially Atlas Shrugged or The Fountainhead - - would make it more meaningful and relevant.

I will hope to see you THIS SUNDAY!!!

I have to pay meetup.com $19.00 per month to use their site, but for me, this is a small price to pay for the opportunity to meet other people interested in Objectivism, the philosophy of Ayn Rand. However, if anyone would be willing to donate a dollar or two to help me defray the monthly expenditure, that would be great.

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Ayn Rand October Meetup
